sage.ai.behaviortrees

Class BTSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior
      • sage.ai.behaviortrees.BTComposite
        • sage.ai.behaviortrees.BTSelector

  • public class BTSelector
extends BTComposite
    A BTSelector node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right looking for first success. When a child succeeds then the BTSelector returns success. If all children fail then the the BTSelector returns failure. You are basically ORing all of the return Status's of Behaviors together.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Alex J. Champandard
    See Also:
    Behavior Trees Tutorial Video

    Behavior Trees Starter Kit
